# l2-page-title

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

A horizontal rule

## Usage

### Example

```tsx
export default () => (
    <l2-sidebar>
        <l2-layout-section>
            <l2-layout-link url={'/'}>{'Some link'}</l2-layout-link>
        </l2-layout-section>
        <l2-layout-hr />
        <l2-layout-section>
            <l2-layout-link url={'/go'}>{'Some link'}</l2-layout-link>
        </l2-layout-section>
    </l2-sidebar>
);
```
